article_title: Run away! Colorado Gov. John Hickenlooper suddenly 'no big fan of' Obamacare [video] – twitchy.com
article_text:
Hickenlooper said he's no big fan of affordable care act. He was booed #copolitcs — Monica Mendoza (@Mendo1987) October 16, 2014

Colorado’s Democrat Gov. John Hickenlooper has been a proponent of Obamacare. However, during last night’s debate with his Republican challenger Bob Beauprez, Hickenlooper attempted to make some quick distance from the Affordable Care Act:

#fangate GOING NATIONAL RT @allenfuller: VIDEO: @hickforco: “I’m no big fan of the ACA” https://t.co/YCMoiHer7s — Charlie Spiering (@charliespiering) October 16, 2014

Nice try, Governor!

“More Coloradans will benefit when the Affordable Care Act is fully implemented in 2014,” Hickenlooper said. #copolitics #Hickpocrisy — Bob Beauprez (@bobbeauprez) October 16, 2014

That’s what Hickenlooper said.

***
